FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Armored Assault

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What happens if I play an Armor after I play Armored Assault?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Similar to Blade Flurry, it will not gain the Bold 1. The bonus is determined when you play Armored Assault and won't change even if the character gains or loses an Armor later in the turn.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    What if my Armor is scrapped before attacking or before flipping cards?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    You will keep the Bold 1 if somehow your armor is scrapped after you play Armored Assault.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Do the +2 and the Bold 1 have to go to the same character?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes. The ‘it’ in the second line is applying to the character you chose for the first part of the ability.
